title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2202.1 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2202.1 - General provisions

State Regulations

Tuition assistance program (TAP) awards are available to
those students who satisfy the general eligibility requirements of Subpart
145-2 and Part 2201 of this Title and the specific eligibility requirements set
forth in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2202.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
